title: AAC Media Day
description:
Wendi Nix, Sam Acho, and David Pollack take a look at Ohio State football as they begin camp today. The crew also react to AAC Commissioner Mike Aresco's comments on playoff expansion and conference realignment.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: CFB Live: The CFB Live crew discuss season expectations for the AAC and make predictions for Week 1 of college football season.
